dc:title: Communism and the Intellectual
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Summarizes the pro-Communist and anti-Capitalist speeches by a group of intellectuals at a symposium whose subject was "Why we vote Communist."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 42 1933-01-28 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
